name: The Ruins: VR Escape the Room
description: As an archaeologist following in the footsteps of your grandfather, you find yourself trapped in an arcane site. Uncover artifacts and solve ancient puzzles to fulfill your legacy. There's a great secret held here; what will you discover?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: Oculus Rift users must have Touch and 360° tracking.
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 64bit Processor: Intel i5-4690 or AMD FX 9590 equivalent or greater. Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 980 or AMD Radeon R9 290x or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space Additional Notes: Oculus Rift users must have Touch and 360° tracking.
